channel.title: CVE Feed for OX Software GmbH -- OX App Suite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OX Software GmbH -- OX App Suite

item.title: CVE-2023-26439|2024-01-12T07:13:12.378Z -- ox%20software%20gmbh -- ox%20app%20suite
item.description: The cacheservice API could be abused to inject parameters with SQL syntax which was insufficiently sanitized before getting executed as SQL statement. Attackers with access to a local or restricted network were able to perform arbitrary SQL queries, discovering other users cached data. We have improved the input check for API calls and filter for potentially malicious content. No publicly available exploits are known.
